name: Anphabe JSC
tag_list: online-network, success-tips, manager-jobs, director-jobs, headhunt, headhunt-market, heanhunter
overview:
ANPHABE.COM is Vietnam largest community for leaders and experts with 50,000+ management members.

Our mission is to connect millions of professionals in Vietnam to their next successes through valuable contacts, useful knowledge and relevant career opportunities.

At ANPHABE.COM, members can:

[] Extend new networks as well as re-connect with friends and colleagues (http://www.anphabe.com/user/login)

[] Discuss and learn directly from many reputable business leaders & experts at Anphabe “Share to Succeed” discussions (http://www.anphabe.com/qa) and networking events (http://event.anphabe.com/)

[] Access to hard-to-find recruitment information from Anphabe Headhunt Market - Vietnam’s only headhunt portal and special top employers’ introduction page at http://www.anphabe.com/jobs

Anphabe.com doesn’t charge membership fee. High-level professionals can register membership easily at www.Anphabe.com.
